items.title: WATCH:  'Mission possible' for sweets-loving twins
items.description: The 3-year-old twins worked together to get a packet of candy without getting caught by their mom.

items.title: 2 killed as Russian overnight attack hits infrastructure in Ukraine, officials say
items.description: The prime target of the attacks was the industrial city of Kremenchuk, Ukraine, where some energy infrastructure was attacked, officials said.
